sections.heading: Requirement
sections.text: of more than 1,000 inhabitants for incorporation.

sections.heading: Duties
sections.text: of county commissioners on disincorporation; establishment of special district.

sections.heading: Disposition
sections.text: of records; justice of peace to complete all unfinished business of court.

sections.heading: Expenses
sections.text: of disincorporation; salaries of officers whose offices are abolished.

sections.heading: Cityï¿½s
sections.text:
governing board may file declaration of incorporation; duties of Attorney

General.

sections.heading: County
sections.text:
commissioners may disincorporate city upon petition of majority of resident

voters; conditions.

sections.heading: Dissolution
sections.text: not to invalidate or affect rights, penalties or contracts.

sections.heading: Trustees:
sections.text: Payment of money; final settlement; compensation.

sections.heading: Annual
sections.text: revenues to be disposed of for benefit of city or town.

sections.heading: Limitation
sections.text: on use of money by county commissioners.
